name: E-Connector for WooCommerce
author: Vaisonet

sections.description:
This plugin requires the use of the E-Connector from Vaisonet. You can find more information on the official site.

It adds a few useful features to your WooCommerce site :

  • Sales documents are sent directly to your WooCommerce site, and are available on your customers’ WooCommerce account.
  • Send notifications to admins and customers when a new document is available.
  • Admin can manage uploaded document in the Media library like any other uploaded files.
sections.installation:
You can install the plugin directly from your admin interface.

  1. Go to your plugins page in your site’s admin area.
  2. Click “Add a plugin”
  3. Search for “E-Connector for WooCommerce” and click Install.

Or, you can install it manually.

  1. Download and unzip the plugin folder.
  2. Upload the folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory on your site, via FTP.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

Bug fix : Error on profile pages

1.1.0

Added local SQLITE DB management for product prices

1.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: E-Connector for WooCommerce adds useful functionality to your WooCommerce site to complement your usage of the E-Connector by Vaisonet.
description:
This plugin requires the use of the E-Connector from Vaisonet. You can find more information on the official site.

It adds a few useful features to your WooCommerce site :

  • Sales documents are sent directly to your WooCommerce site, and are available on your customers’ WooCommerce account.
  • Send notifications to admins and customers when a new document is available.

upgrade_notice.1.1.0: Added local SQLITE DB management for product prices

screenshots.caption: As an administrator, manage documents exactly like any other media. Filter, delete, view, etc...
Customers can view their documents or download them on their WooCommerce account page.
Configure the email notifications sent just like any other WooCommerce emails
Choose mail subject, header, and whether to attach the uploaded document to it or not.
